group_path: F1 — Inputs: Top Risks + Top Opportunities (Synthesized Themes)
raw_fields: Protect deep skills: Guard deep literacy, reasoning, and “productive struggle” from cognitive offloading/skill atrophy.  Personalize learning: Use AI for tutoring, feedback, and targeted supports (when accurate and appropriate).  Keep learning human: Rebalance toward hands-on work, discussion, and authentic thinking—not screen-mediated compliance.
source_csv_path: project_files/03 - Values & Principles/F1  Inputs- Top Risks + Top Opportunities (Synthesized Themes).csv
text: Protect deep skills: Guard deep literacy, reasoning, and “productive struggle” from cognitive offloading/skill atrophy.  Personalize learning: Use AI for tutoring, feedback, and targeted supports (when accurate and appropriate).  Keep learning human: Rebalance toward hands-on work, discussion, and authentic thinking—not screen-mediated compliance.

group_path: F1 — Inputs: Top Risks + Top Opportunities (Synthesized Themes)
raw_fields: Clarify boundaries: Define fair use vs cheating, plus consistent student attribution expectations.  Design for evidence: Redesign assessments for “process evidence” (drafts, oral defense, in-class performance, authentic products).  Avoid detector traps: Don’t rely on “AI detectors”; use instruction + assessment design that makes integrity visible.
source_csv_path: project_files/03 - Values & Principles/F1  Inputs- Top Risks + Top Opportunities (Synthesized Themes).csv
text: Clarify boundaries: Define fair use vs cheating, plus consistent student attribution expectations.  Design for evidence: Redesign assessments for “process evidence” (drafts, oral defense, in-class performance, authentic products).  Avoid detector traps: Don’t rely on “AI detectors”; use instruction + assessment design that makes integrity visible.

group_path: F1 — Inputs: Top Risks + Top Opportunities (Synthesized Themes)
raw_fields: Reduce busywork: Use AI to lower admin load while preserving teacher professional judgment and agency.  Support consistency: Provide PD, exemplars, and staff playbooks to prevent uneven practice and high-stakes misuse.  Protect the profession: Don’t assume AI time-savings for staffing; guard against deprofessionalization.
source_csv_path: project_files/03 - Values & Principles/F1  Inputs- Top Risks + Top Opportunities (Synthesized Themes).csv
text: Reduce busywork: Use AI to lower admin load while preserving teacher professional judgment and agency.  Support consistency: Provide PD, exemplars, and staff playbooks to prevent uneven practice and high-stakes misuse.  Protect the profession: Don’t assume AI time-savings for staffing; guard against deprofessionalization.

group_path: F1 — Inputs: Top Risks + Top Opportunities (Synthesized Themes)

group_path: F1 — Inputs: Top Risks + Top Opportunities (Synthesized Themes)
raw_fields: Close access gaps: Ensure equitable access to vetted tools and supports so adoption doesn’t widen gaps.  Design for inclusion: Build accessibility/UDL requirements in from day one (SPED/504/ELL, accommodations, families).  Require human review: Treat AI outputs as assistive—not authoritative—especially for disability-related/high-stakes decisions.
source_csv_path: project_files/03 - Values & Principles/F1  Inputs- Top Risks + Top Opportunities (Synthesized Themes).csv
text: Close access gaps: Ensure equitable access to vetted tools and supports so adoption doesn’t widen gaps.  Design for inclusion: Build accessibility/UDL requirements in from day one (SPED/504/ELL, accommodations, families).  Require human review: Treat AI outputs as assistive—not authoritative—especially for disability-related/high-stakes decisions.

group_path: F1 — Inputs: Top Risks + Top Opportunities (Synthesized Themes)
raw_fields: Minimize exposure: Reduce student data risk; verify vendor terms and FERPA/IDEA-aligned protections before use.  Stop shadow adoption: Clarify what’s allowed, what requires approval, and what’s prohibited.  Build trust openly: Address safety + transparency (content risks, plain-language communication, ethical concerns).
source_csv_path: project_files/03 - Values & Principles/F1  Inputs- Top Risks + Top Opportunities (Synthesized Themes).csv
text: Minimize exposure: Reduce student data risk; verify vendor terms and FERPA/IDEA-aligned protections before use.  Stop shadow adoption: Clarify what’s allowed, what requires approval, and what’s prohibited.  Build trust openly: Address safety + transparency (content risks, plain-language communication, ethical concerns).

group_path: F1 — Inputs: Top Risks + Top Opportunities (Synthesized Themes)
raw_fields: Keep policy agile: Make guidance usable and revisable, with an explicit review cadence as AI evolves.  Tier tool use: Use a tiered tool/use-case pathway that enables safe experimentation without overregulation.  Demand evidence: Collect qualitative/quantitative feedback to avoid policy “based on vibes.”
source_csv_path: project_files/03 - Values & Principles/F1  Inputs- Top Risks + Top Opportunities (Synthesized Themes).csv
text: Keep policy agile: Make guidance usable and revisable, with an explicit review cadence as AI evolves.  Tier tool use: Use a tiered tool/use-case pathway that enables safe experimentation without overregulation.  Demand evidence: Collect qualitative/quantitative feedback to avoid policy “based on vibes.”
